text: Thomas Atcitty (November 1, 1933 - October 11, 2020) was an American educator, politician and businessman. He was the third president of the Navajo Nation, serving from February 1998 until June 1998. From 1981 to 1995, he was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives. Atcitty was a member of the Democratic Party. Atcitty died on October 11, 2020 in Shiprock, New Mexico at the age of 86.Former Navajo Nation President Thomas Atcitty dies at age 86 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Educators from New Mexico Category:Presidents of the Navajo Nation Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:Businesspeople from New Mexico Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas Atcitty
